document_data.name: Fredrichk
document_data.mainbody:
'''Fredrichk''' was a Sentry in the hidden [[Cloister of Sombre Embrace]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''The Mother Superior will deal with you.''|Sentry Fredrichk}}
document_data.Description: Fredrichk was a full-faced [[hin]] with short curly brown hair. He wore a ceremonial set of [[Church of Shar|Sharran]] [[medium armor]] adorned with the dark goddesses' ''[[holy symbol]]s''. Fredrichk carried a Sharran [[scimitar]] and defended himself with a large [[shield]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Fredrichk served the [[Viconia DeVir|Mother Superior]] as one of her sentries underneath the [[House of Grief]] in the Cloister of Sombre Embrace. Fredrichk, along with the entirety of the cloister may have confronted its member [[Shadowheart]] were she to turn away from Shar and possibly perish in the struggle. By other accounts, Fredrichk and the rest of the cloister helped defend the city of Baldur's Gate from the army of the [[Absolute]], were Shadowheart to remain loyal to her deity, or if Shadowheart was betrayed and surrendered to the Mother Superior for punishment.
